scenario_text.value:
So, Agumon, what do you make of that woman we
met earlier?

Oh, okay. I mean, she seemed suspicious, but
I’d hate to doubt her without any reason.
Oh yeah? You sure are nice, Takuma.

Nah, that’s not called being nice, Agumon.
That’s called being indecisive.

Look, Takuma, I want you to remember this.
If something important to you is on the line,

don’t think, act. Because once it’s gone,
whatever you do, it’ll be too late.
Right... I’ll keep that in mind.
Well, I think you’re nice, Takuma.
